ratings.text: Very fun car! Seats are extremely comfortable. The car had plenty of power. I used this as my commuter to work and it got the job done. Our host was very helpful and made the trip worry-free. Highly recommend renting this.

ratings.author: Thomas

ratings.author: Joel
ratings.text: Unfortunately, the car was not ready for almost 4 hours after I requested. This was due to a repair but I felt the car to be unfit to be driving. The tires and overall engine did not seem fit. The car also had a smell of smoke and was not clean. Host was responsive and nice.

guidelines: Patience is something you admire in the driver behind you and scorn in the one ahead.

ratings.author: Milo
ratings.text: Car was meh

ratings.text: Honestly, I've seen better. It said no smoking but you could definitely smell it. That sucked.

description: My 2015 Nissan Versa Note is a great car . I maintain it regularly. Oil changes and maintenance done on time. It is very clean inside and outside. It has keyless entry. Please check the pictures. This car is also great on mileage, tires are in great condition. Great for family and friends trip. It has charging ports too. As Turo requires, please return the car is the same condition as taken.
guidelines: Smoking is strongly prohibited
This car gets you from a to b and that's about it
